text: Motion

Motion
Motion
Motion

Asahi, Mei,
Sit over there for a moment.

Do you know why
Fuyuko is angry?

...You two went to the senior's place again today,
to get snacks, right?

Yes!
They were sweet and delicious!

...Ah! Could it be
because you didn't save any for Fuyuko--

--There's no way that's true!
...You two really--
Haha...
...Did you just laugh?

Sorry, sorry. I didn't laugh at Fuyuko.
I was just thinking we managed today's work well as a trio.

Oh, what's that~?
Are you getting emotional about our growth~?

...Maybe so.
Asahi's freedom is still loved by everyone--

Fuyuko's gap between her usual cuteness and her powerful
stage presence, and the heat visible within Mei's cool behavior...

I thought the good qualities of all three
are gradually getting through to everyone.

...Really, it took me a while to notice!
And neither Asahi nor Mei know how much effort it takes.

Well? The staff who has to support that must have
their favorability towards Fuyuko increased significantly!

You're amazing.
...Fuyuko is truly suited for this.

How about becoming
the leader of Straylight?

...W-Well?
Only Fuyuko can do that, right? Leading these two!

Both of you! Now that Fuyuko is the leader,
you better listen to her properly from now on!
Ahaha / Ahaha~
